How does storytelling get processed inside your brain. Learn the Neuroscience of Storytelling.
Learn how to use storytelling in business to increase the impact of your communications and your ability to persuade, influence and inspire others.

items.title: Public Speaking & Presentation Skills

visible_instructors.job_title: Head trainer at Talking Shop Training Ltd.
visible_instructors.title: Stewart Theobald
visible_instructors.name: Stewart

items.headline: Gain self-confidence and key presentation skills to engage your audience with ease
objectives_summary: You will learn the art of presenting with confidence and clarity. Public speaking is something that is daunting to most people, however it needn't be. With this structured course, you will learn techniques for overcoming stage fright and presenting with ease.
You will learn how to set effective objectives and storyboard your talk for maximum impact. Engaging your audience with enthusiasm and knowledge.
You will discover the effects of body language on you and your audience and learn techniques to present at your best.

items.title: THE BULLETPROOF MINDSET
items.headline: Learning how to build personal resilience to manage yourself, manage others and demanding situations.
objectives_summary: One of the tougher challenges professionals face is the ability to remain reflective and objective in demanding situations.  They know that being in a distressed state of mind serves no value and can even make things worse.  By understanding some of the fundamentals of the brainâ€™s inner-workings and using that knowledge in their daily lives can mean the difference between succeeding and failing.

People who share similar background respond in dramatically different ways to the same life event. Some are resilient in the face of stress, while others fall apart. The latter becomes anxious, depressed, or unable to function with they encounter adversity. Resilient people are somehow able not only to withstand but to benefit from certain kinds of stressful events and to turn adversity into advantage.
THE BULLETPROOF MINDSET is about building personal resilience to manage yourself, manage others and manage difficult situations.
